snippet: Some of the companies that built Japan’s nuclear plants are now cashing in on the cleanup, though their knowledge of decontamination is a work in progress.
abstract: Some of the companies that built Japan’s nuclear plants are now cashing in on the cleanup through government contracts, though their knowledge of radiation decontamination is a work in progress and some of the work has been haphazard; critics say the cleanup contracts are emblematic of the too-cozy ties they say have longed existed between the nuclear industry and government.
lead_paragraph: Some of the companies that built Japan’s nuclear plants are now cashing in on the cleanup, though their knowledge of decontamination is a work in progress.

headline.seo: After Fukushima Disaster, a Confused Effort at Cleanup
